sentence.Network_en: His relations with colleagues, differences of opinion notwithstanding, were unfailingly friendly.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管有意见分歧，他和同事们一直关系融洽。

sentence.Network_en: Foreigners unfailingly fall in love with the place.
sentence.Network_cn: 外国人都爱上了这个地方。

sentence.Network_en: He was unfailingly polite to customers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对顾客总是以礼相待。

PerfectNetExp.abs: unfailing 经久不衰的unfailingly 无穷尽地unfair 不公平的
unfailing 无故障的, unfailingly 不倦地, unfailing 长盛不衰

list.abs: messages that can unfailingly guarantee that the contents remain complete and unaltered from the time when they are finally generated .能够可靠地保证自最终形成时起，内容保持完整、未被更改。
6. Is unfailingly logical(最具逻辑性的人)7. Is deeply empathetic (有着深深信仰的人)8. Is spiritually advanced (思想成熟的人)9. Can handle a crisis.

entry.def: If you describe someone's good qualities or behaviour as unfailing, you mean that they never change.

example.ex: He had the unfailing care and support of Erica, his wife...
example.tran: 他的妻子埃丽卡始终如一地关心和支持着他。

example.ex: ...a man of unfailing courtesy and kindness...
example.tran: 始终彬彬有礼、心地善良的人

auth_sentence.content: Egyptians are mostly unfailingly hospitable and happy to talk.
auth_sentence.res_content: Egyptians are mostly unfailingly hospitable and happy to talk.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Egyptians are mostly unfailingly hospitable and happy to talk.

auth_sentence.content: He was unfailingly courteous and beautifully mannered.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was unfailingly courteous and beautifully mannered.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was unfailingly courteous and beautifully mannered.

auth_sentence.content: In news stories, he emerged as unfailingly driven and precise.
auth_sentence.res_content: In news stories, he emerged as unfailingly driven and precise.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In news stories, he emerged as unfailingly driven and precise.

Sentence.sentence: The recession has certainly come with more problems than Andrea anticipated, but she remains unfailingly optimistic.

sentences.en: She was unfailingly courteous and helpful.
sentences.cn: 她无论什么时候都彬彬有礼，乐于助人。
